snippet: A top Guatemalan general and four other officers were killed on Wednesday when the helicopter they were in crashed near the country’s northern border with Mexico, Guatemala’s government said.
abstract: Top Guatemala Gen Rudy Ortiz and four other officers are killed in helicopter crash near country's northern border with Mexico.
lead_paragraph: A top Guatemalan general and four other officers were killed on Wednesday when the helicopter they were in crashed near the country’s northern border with Mexico, Guatemala’s government said.
